title: Can Fervor Of Battle Be Brought Back?
body:
Does anyone actually think conqueror is better designed than fervor of battle? Fervor was healthier for the game now everyone is running around with true damage 2 shotting people. Also conqueror has made some champions super toxic (jax). Anyway was fervor every this toxic to play against? Also don't say "fervor was not interactive. Legit almost every single rune in the game is "none interactive". Also fervor was good on top lane fighters as well as ADCS.

TLDR: Replace conq with fervor of battle.

there is a difference between bonus armor pen and total armor pen. Conq is not bonus armor its true damage.
No, Conqueror gives true damage. Not armor pen. True damage just completely ignores all armor/MR whereas armor pen just negates a part of the armor.

That would only be true if conqueror gave bonus damage. It does not. 

A 200 AD auto with no crit, after conqueror will deal 160 physical damage AND 40 true damage. 
This is effectively 20% total armor pen, as a low armor target will reduce the 160 to 120+40 true damage instead of 200 to 150, net 10 damage increase. 
High armor would reduce the 160 to 40+40 true damage instead of 200 reduced to 50, a net 30 damage increase. 

Conqueror just allows a portion of your damage to bypass armor, aka its armor penetration because your 200 AD auto is still doing 200 premitigation damage.

I'm fine with removing Conqueror if we fix the tank problem, otherwise at least 2 way imbalance keeps things level even if it is unhealthy.

>too much CC

CC out the ass is core to the class

>and base damage

Which is also core to the class, especially when they build exactly zero dedicated damage items.

>and also CC engage ults

There´s no issue with having those. And they seem broken in competitive because tanks as a class were essentially made for competitive play. That does not make them problematic.

If anything, it explains why despite borderlining on troll picks in SoloQ, TK and Sejuani got nerfed. Tanks are too team reliant unless they were so overtuned they can carry the game by themselves, which is what Sion is doing presently.

When you have 5 people with voice comms and all of them know how to play with and around each other, of course tanks are gonna look broken.

Tanks are the ones countered the hardest by the slightest of resistance purchases, because them augmenting their damage through penetration or more of their main scaling offensive resource means they won´t last a lot in any fights, thus solving the too much base damage problem.

Merc Treads on a slot and suddenly most tanks are not even close to being the threats they could have been had those boots not been built.

The problem with Conqueror is that it was made to solve a problem that didn´t really exist and created several more that would´ve been avoided almost entirely had it not been conceived.

Now that stat shards are a thing, LDR lost Giant Slayer and is now total ArPen, Conqueror's existence is barely, if at all justifiable.
